LanguageData.ToolkitRaids.MergeRaids.Label: Merge Twitch raids into one.
LanguageData.ToolkitRaids.MergeRaids.Description: When enabled, the mod will merge all raids into one singular one. This singular raid will be the oldest active raid that's accepting viewers via !joinraid.
LanguageData.ToolkitRaids.StorytellerRaid.Label: Generate a default storyteller raid.
LanguageData.ToolkitRaids.StorytellerRaid.Description: When enabled, the mod will generate a standard raid based on the parameters the storyteller returns. The parameters will be based off a standard big threat raid on any player owned map. Disabling this expose more advanced settings that'll allow you to fine tune some of the point calculations the mod will do.
LanguageData.ToolkitRaids.Duration.Label: How long do viewers have, in seconds, to join the raid.
LanguageData.ToolkitRaids.Duration.Description: The amount of time, in seconds, viewers will have to join the raid event by typing !joinraid in chat. Changing this value only affects raids received after the change.
LanguageData.ToolkitRaids.MaxPoints.Label: How high should Twitch raids scale point wise?
LanguageData.ToolkitRaids.MaxPoints.Description: The maximum amount of points a raid is permitted to be. While you can set this higher than normally permitted by RimWorld, the game may still adjust the maximum points to a lower value.
LanguageData.ToolkitRaids.PersonPoints.Label: The number of points a person will add to the raid's points.
LanguageData.ToolkitRaids.PersonPoints.Description: The amount of points a single raider, including the raid leader, is valued at. The final calculated value will then be adjusted to be on par with a standard storyteller raid.
